extendedInfo.description: TiME LIMITED OFFER !!NOW FOR ONLY 1.49$ INSTEAD OF 2.49$ (40%OFF).App2SD (Move app 2 SD)ProWith this handy app, you'll have more control over your ever expanding collection of apps.this app solves all your memory issues.A great UI that makes it easy to:-â notify when a new movable app is installed.âadded setting menu.ânow notification can be disabled on setting menu.âshows system apps.âexport app list to sdcard in csv format.âclear cache with one click.ânotify if cache size is more than 512 kb in setting(by default it is disabled).âshow internal and sdcard total and free storage.â View all SD card capable apps and move them.â show app cache/data/code/total size.â move apps from phone to SD Cardâ uninstall apps.â sort through apps stored on phone and SD cardâ move apps back to phone.â view app on Marketâ open app.â share app with one click without backup.â three sort modes by install time,size and name ascending and descending.â move all apps option.â show app details page.â support "Move2SD Enabler"âMove to sd or movetosd all sdmove apps and also sdwatch card for memory shortages.This app is not used to backup apps to SD card. It only helps you to move a portion of apps used space to SD card.Galaxy S3 and Note2 is not supported:* Galaxy S3 and Note2 configures the SD card as a secondary external storage. This is configured by Samsung. Nothing developers can do about this. Please contact Samsung for details. No Notification Ads - we don't use any notification ads.If you are interested in helping us to translate this app to your native language, please let me know by email. Thanks.FAQ:-1. What is "App2SD"?"App2SD" is short for app to SD card, and it is also called app to sd.2. Why do so many apps that cannot moved to sdcard(App2SD)?ANS:-1.Only the app is configured to supported to be installed on SD card by the developer that can it App2SD. So you will see many apps are "On Phone Only".2.The app is copyright protected.3.APP2SD is a feature introduced from android version 2.2 ,so not all apps support this feature.4.The developer forces his app can only be installed to phone storage.3.Why some apps are shown in green color in movable tab?Ans:-Ignored apps are shown in green color.

reviews.title: Not working as it should, use to work great
reviews.comment: I recently started using a phone with external storage again after having used a phone with on board storage only for awhile. I used this on previous devices with external storage and it was perfect for managing storage. Giving only 3 stars because I cannot get anything to move to the sd card. Looking for a solution to come along as I know this app worked great in the past.  Update: I have discovered that the issue I am having is due to my device,  not the app. I am using a Samsung Galaxy Note 2.
reviews.author: Ryan Nish

reviews.comment: I have a droid RAZR m. It doesnt give any option to move apps to SD card which was why I got it... time for refund
reviews.author: Jonathan Barker

reviews.title: so slow its useless
reviews.comment: can take ten minutes to load initial screen.  move *one* app, and it starts the \"loading... \" process all over.  Only way to use it is to set the phone aside and forget about it after every operation.
reviews.author: Adam Felson

reviews.title: It doesn\'t work on S2
reviews.comment: I want a refund. Refund attempt failed.
reviews.author: Hana Sarcia

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Just so easy to move apps from and to,nice ui, clear cache in a blink
reviews.author: Rohit Jain

reviews.title: Won\'t work on some Samsung mobs
reviews.comment: I had this app on my old HTC mob and was excellent! However incompatible with  Samsung galaxy s3 mini. Company kindly agreed refund. Thanku!
reviews.author: Susan Ward Davis

reviews.title: Doesn\'t load
reviews.comment: Nonfunctional on Galaxy Note 2. Don\'t buy!
reviews.author: Jeremy Hitching
